'''Masala Cheese Balls''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Masala Cheese Balls is obtainable by completing the [[World Quest]] ''[[Cooking, the Aroma of Homecoming]]''.

Depending on the quality, Masala Cheese Balls increases all party members' critical rate by '''6'''/'''9'''/'''12'''% for 300 second. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s). Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
